snippet: Speaking to a civic group, mayoral candidate Bill de Blasio delivered his most detailed blueprint yet for how he would change New York.
abstract: New York City mayoral candidate Bill de Blasio, in speech before prominent civic group, delivers his most detailed blueprint yet for how he would reimagine New York as a more equitable and populist metropolis; outlines plans to raise wages while praising economic policies of Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, in effort to subtly reassure city's corporate titans that he is not their enemy.
lead_paragraph: Speaking to a civic group, mayoral candidate Bill de Blasio delivered his most detailed blueprint yet for how he would change New York.

headline.main: De Blasio Focuses on Inequality as He Courts Business Elite
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Details Vision for Fixing City’s Inequality

keywords.value: Assn for a Better New York
keywords.name: organizations
